.
VHA Responsibilities for Identifying and Maintaining Certain Original VA Records
The Veterans Health Administration (VHA) is responsible for identifying and permanently maintaining any original VA records pertaining to HIV or AIDS, alcohol abuse, drug abuse, or sickle cell anemia.
VHA specifically identifies these records as falling under the purview of
38 U.S.C. 7332
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
